40 Liter Travel

Summer

Essentials

  • Clothing
  • 3 x t-shirts
  • 1 x long-sleeve button shirt
  • 2 x shorts
  • 1 x jeans
  • 3 x socks
  • 3 x underwear
  • 1 x raincoat
  • 1 x running shoes
  • 1 x belt
  • 1 x athletic shorts
  • Electronics
  • 1 x iPhone 5s
  • 1 x watch
  • 1 - 3 x SD cards, 32 Gb
  • 1 x headphones
  • Gear
  • 1 x 40-liter backpack
  • 1 x small daypack
  • 1 x water bottle
  • Miscellaneous
  • 1 x cash
  • 2 x credit cards
  • 1 x passport
  • 1 x sunglasses
  • 1 x ink pen
  • 6 x zip lock bags
  • Toiletries
  • Toothbrush
  • Small toothpaste
  • Floss
  • Mouth wash
  • Small soap
  • Small shampoo
  • Small deodorant
  • Finger nail clippers
  • Tweezers
  • Face wipes
  • Stain wipes
  • Bathing wipes
  • Wet naps

Optional

  • First Aid Kit
  • Band aids
  • Neosporin
  • Aleve
  • Anti-histamines
  • Ibuprofen
  • Antacid
  • Benadryl
  • Cough drops

  • Oral rehydration salts
  • Electrolyte tablets
  • Anti-diarrheal medication
  • Hand sanitizer
  • Eye drops
  • Sunscreen
  • Alcohol wipes
  • Anitmalarial medication
  • Miscellaneous
  • 1 x Kindle
  • 1 x portable backup charger
  • 1 x solar charger
  • 1 x digital camera
  • 1 x swimtrunks
  • 1 x sandals
  • 1 x towel
  • 1 x spork
  • 1 x hat
